altername_name: Yami no Ketsuzoku Special: The Predestined Homicides
name: Yami no Ketsuzoku Special
overview: Yami no Ketsuzoku Special contains two games: Yami no Ketsuzoku Yami no Ketsuzoku: Kanketsu-hen Both titles are merged into a single game - the player can start the second chapter only after having completed the first. This version also replaces the synthesized music of the original release with CD audio tracks.
